title: Vaccine Ingredients
description: Learn why the ingredients in vaccines are necessary. Each ingredient in a vaccine serves a specific purpose.
cleaned_text: Links with this icon indicate that you are leaving the CDC website. - The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) cannot attest to the accuracy of a non-federal website. - Linking to a non-federal website does not constitute an endorsement by CDC or any of its employees of the sponsors or the information and products presented on the website. - You will be subject to the destination website's privacy policy when you follow the link. - CDC is not responsible for Section 508 compliance (accessibility) on other federal or private website.
